Name: Aether
Effect: You gain a flying speed of 20 feet for 1 hour.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity ability checks for 1 hour.

Name: Alluring
Effect: Your skin and voice become malleable, allowing you to slightly enhance your appearance and presence. You have advantage on Charisma ability checks.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on initiative rolls.

Name: Celerity
Effect: Your Dexterity score increases by 3, as does your Dexterity maximum.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws.

Name: Conversant
Effect: You gain advantage on Intelligence ability checks.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Wisdom ability checks.

Name: Cruelty
Effect: When you use the Attack action, you can make an additional weapon attack as a bonus action.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

Name: Deftness
Effect: You gain advantage on Dexterity ability checks.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Wisdom ability checks.

Name: Embers
Effect: You gain resistance to fire damage.
Side-effect: You gain vulnerability to cold damage.

Name: Gelid
Effect: You gain resistance to cold damage.
Side-effect: You gain vulnerability to fire damage.

Name: Impermeable
Effect: You gain resistance to piercing damage.
Side-effect: You gain vulnerability to slashing damage.

Name: Mobility
Effect: You gain immunity to the grappled and restrained conditions.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Strength ability checks.

Name: Nighteye
Effect: You gain darkvision for up to 60 feet. If you already have darkvision, this increases its range by 60 additional feat.
Side-effect: You gain sunlight sensitivity.

Name: Percipient
Effect: You gain advantage on Wisdom ability checks.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Charisma ability checks.

Name: Potency
Effect: Your Strength score increases by 3, as does your Strength maximum.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

Name: Precision
Effect: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Strength saving throws.

Name: Rapidity
Effect: Your speed increases by 10 feet.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Intelligence ability checks.

Name: Reconstruction
Effect: For 1 hour, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to your proficiency bonus if you have at least 1 hit point, but no more than half of your hit points.
Side-effect: Your speed decreases by 10 ft.

Name: Sagacity
Effect: Your Intelligence score increases by 3, as does your Intelligence maximum.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on Charisma saving throws.

Name: Shielded
Effect: You gain resistance to slashing damage.
Side-effect: You gain vulnerability to bludgeoning damage.

Name: Unbreakable
Effect: You gain resistance to bludgeoning damage.
Side-effect: You gain vulnerability to piercing damage.

Name: Vermillion
Effect: You gain the abillity to envelop your attacks with natural poison. Add 1d6 poison damage to all weapon attacks.
Side-effect: You have disadvantage on death saving throws.
